project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on a CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file by calculating and displaying mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement CSV file reading and data extraction
Implement mean calculation for numerical columns
Implement median calculation for numerical columns
Implement mode calculation for numerical columns
Create user interface for column selection
Write tests for each of the implemented features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
